column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/375305DAP's 'naughtiness' strengthened PAS to pursue Act 355 amendments10 Mar 2017DAP's "naughtiness" has strengthened PAS enough for them to push for their proposed amendments to the Syariah Courts (Criminal Jurisdiction) Act 1965 (Act 355), said MIC treasurer-general S Vell Paari."Due to PAS' success in the last general election by virtue of being supported by DAP, PAS is now a major component to the Selangor state government and also still a member of the opposition bloc in this country."This strength has allowed PAS to submit their amendment to Act 355 with respect to the syariah courts," Vell Paari said in a statement today.For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. Menteri hadir himpunan 355, MIC mahu jumpa PM21 Feb 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4202513Subra also to quit cabinet if hudud implementedMkini 29 May 2016 SoS...MIC president S Subramaniam has joined the chorus of BN leaders who said they would quit the cabinet if hudud is implemented...."If after all our efforts hudud is still implemented, then I will relinquish my post in the government," Subramaniam said at the MIC extraordinary general meeting in Subang Jaya today.
